name: 2023 The 7th International Conference on Communications and Future Internet
content: Publication: Conference Proceedings: Accepted papers of ICCFI 2023 after proper registration and presentation will be published in the conference proceedings, which will be submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Journal: Journal of Communications (Website: http://www.jocm.us/, DOI: 10.12720/jcm, Abbreviated Title: J. Commun.) ISSN: 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print) Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus; DBLP; CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; CNKI, etc. CiteScore: 1.9 (2021)
